summary: Discovered and created tools for Canada-wide FBP fuel data access

learning_events.content: Canada-wide FBP fuel data available: 3.0 GB, 30m resolution, 178k×119k pixels covering all of Canada

content.name: national_data_extraction
content.description: Extract any Canadian region from national 3GB fuel dataset - Fort McMurray, Jasper, anywhere

learning_events.content: Can validate against ANY Canadian wildfire - Fort McMurray 2016, Jasper 2024, Slave Lake 2011
Completed: Canada-wide data access and extraction system
